thread.title: Excellent Midtown Hotel -
thread.title_full: Excellent Midtown Hotel - Review of Cambria Hotel & Suites - New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: tshep42
title: Excellent Midtown Hotel -
text:
The location is great if you want to be near Times Square. It is a very short walk away but far enough that you're away from the crowds.
The room was a decent size for a Manhattan hotel. There was a mini-fridge, safe and microwave. It had a desk and chair. There was no closet, no dresser and only drawer to put anything in. No iron, hair dryer, and suitcase stand. There's only 2 hooks to hang up anything on.
The room and hotel were very clean. Checkin was a breeze. It's a small hotel. But it does have a business centre to print boarding passes, etc. and a modest sized exercise room. It also has a little bar with a friendly waiter.
The decor is modern. Hallways have carpet but the rooms are hardwood.
They have breakfast but it is pricey. There a Dunkin Donuts a block or two away. They have a modest room service menu as well but I didn't try it. There is a small store with a good selection of snacks and drinks, including beer, for sale in the lobby.
I didn't have any trouble with noise at all. Staff were all friendly and helpful.
